byline.contributor: Falih Hassan contributed reporting from Erbil, an employee of The New York Times from Hilla, Iraq, and Thomas Erdbrink from Tehran.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The pilgrims, who were returning to Iran after a journey to observe Arbaeen, were killed by a truck bomb at a roadside service station.
snippet: The pilgrims, who were returning to Iran after a journey to observe Arbaeen, were killed by a truck bomb at a roadside service station....

headline.main: ISIS Bomb Aimed at Shiite Pilgrims in Iraq Kills at Least 80
headline.print_headline: Scores Killed in Iraq by ISIS Bomb Aimed at Shiite Pilgrims
